background: Determine the selection of items to include in a knapsack that has a fixed capacity, where each item has an associated value and size.
constraints: The total size of the items in the knapsack must not exceed the capacity C
Each item can either be included or not in the knapsack - cannot be fractioned
The knapsack capacity C is non-negative
Each item k has a non-negative size
Each item k has a non-negative value
objective: Maximize the total value of the items packed in the knapsack
description: Maximize the total value of the packed items, where the knapsack has a capacity of \param{C}. Each item k has a value of \param{Value} and a size of \param{Size}.
